title: Understanding IFSP and IEP
text: An IFSP (Individualized Family Service Plan) is typically for children under the age of $$3$$, focusing on early intervention services. An IEP (Individualized Education Program) is for children aged $$3$$ and older, focusing on special education services in schools.

title: Age Consideration
text: Consider Jaquese's age. Is he in the age range for an IFSP or an IEP?

hintAnswer: IEP team, because he is elementary school age
title: Determine the Correct Team
text: Based on Jaquese's age, which team would be appropriate for him?
choices: IEP team, because he is elementary school age
IFSP team, because he is elementary school age
IEP team, because he is high school age
IFSP team, because he is high school age
